reviews.review_msg: Her lectures are honestly some of the most interesting I've ever attended. She has this incredible way of making complex ideas super relatable and engaging. You can tell she puts so much effort into her presentations and the reading materials.  If you get the chance to study with Lidya, don't pass it up!

This professor is for starters, not very captivating during her lectures. I genuinely only struggled with this aspect of the class. However, I found it so disrespectful that she would cancel lectures with so little care about our time and money.

I don't even know where to begin.   Avoid this professor like the plague. Not only did I learn nothing in this class, I struggled to keep myself awake every lecture. I am not even sure what this class is about. I took no notes and the selected readings from the textbook just confused me more. Is it that difficult to find Philosophy professors?!?!?!
